dt2.3:1.5_0: maggasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.3:1.6_0: Te dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:2.1_0: Nirodhasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…
dt2.3:2.2_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:3.1_0: Jīvitindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…
dt2.3:3.2_0: te dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:4.22_0: kammabhavena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…
dt2.3:4.23_0: te dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:5.4_0: jhānena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…
dt2.3:5.5_0: te dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:6.19_0: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.3:6.20_0: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…
dt2.3:6.21_0: te dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:7.2_0: asaṅkhatehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…
dt2.3:7.3_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:8.2_0: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.3:8.3_0: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …
dt2.3:8.4_0: te dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:9.7_0: parāmāsehi ceva parāmaṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …
dt2.3:9.8_0: te dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:10.6_0: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…
dt2.3:10.7_0: te dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:11.2_0: cittānuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…
dt2.3:11.3_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:12.3_0: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.3:12.4_0: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.3:12.5_0: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.3:12.6_0: Te dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
